extendedInfo.description: A large collection of sad quotes and sad sayings, this famous quotes will make you feel like you are not alone in this  world. Life sadness quotes from famous people. Enjoy this free application of sad quotes, they are deep wisdom thoughts on sadness and what makes us truly sad.Add quotes to favorites.Share sad quotes via SMS.Twit best quotes to your twitter.Post good quotes on your Facebook wall.Send greatest popular quotes to your friends vie email.What is sad? - Sadness is emotional pain associated with, or characterized by feelings of disadvantage, loss, despair, helplessness, sorrow, and rage. When sad, people often become outspoken, less energetic, and emotional. Crying is an indication of sadness.Sadness can be viewed as a temporary lowering of mood, whereas depression is characterized by a persistent and intense lowered mood, as well as disruption to one's ability to function in day to day matters.Get free sorrow quotes, words of wisdom, sadness quotations, motivation life quotes,  great wisdom quotes, sad in love, short quotes sad love, famous sad poems, inspiration wisdom of famous authors, depression sayings, sorrow lyrics and quotes of wisdom, famous quotes sayings about life.

reviews.title: Pretty
reviews.comment: Pretty good. Most are a little hard to understand at times but once you get the meaning they are beautiful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay, but...
reviews.comment: There are better quotes out there, there should be more and a few of them repeat. Also I\'d love a widget to display a random quote on my home screen like some other quote apps have. Apart from that it\'s good and some of the quotes are nice. Sadness isn\'t just for emo kids either.
reviews.author: Ant Lo Gelfo

reviews.title: Lonliness is an option
reviews.comment: I like your app a lot! The only problem : I can\'t share it of fb. You have the means, but I cannot cut&paste nor will it show up automatically or else 5star
reviews.author: Eric Arellano

reviews.comment: The most beautiful words i ever read... Uve worked well! Just add some sad background music plzzz. Guys,install the app \'piano music to sleep\' and play \'piano\' in the background while u read these quotes. Its magical. Thank u for this app!!!! \342\231\245
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sadness is...
reviews.comment: Sadness is when you feel unwanted or unloved and you feel nobody cares or loves you and then your heart feels unwanted or unloved and its frustrating and you feel nobody loves you but that\'s not true u may feel that way but theres 2 persons who will always want love and care about you and those people are God and Jesus so dont feel bad just remember they are always in your heart. From Destiny Duran ps.im 8 years old
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: The app has very good quotes. Although, not very many are sad. The reason I got the app was to make me feel better that I wasn\'t alone in some situations, but I do still feel alone. Now, I feel alone more than ever.. the quotes are more about life. Not depression.
